consent.title: Before we Begin
consent.text: To use our IEP Helper tool, we need your permission. By checking this box, you allow us to process your child's IEP information to provide personalized support and recommendations. We keep all information private and secure. You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us.
consent.tooltip: Please check the box to continue

welcome.summary.title: Summary and Translation

welcome.rights.title: Your Rights
welcome.rights.description: Learn about your rights and the IEP process
rights.title: Your Rights as a Parent
rights.description: Hi! We're here to help you understand your child's Individualized Education Program (IEP) better. Navigating this process can feel overwhelming, but you have important rights as a parent. Here are some things you should know:
rights.bulletPoints.1: You can request a translator for IEP meetings to ensure clear communication.
rights.bulletPoints.2: You have the right to take your time before signing an IEP - you don't need to sign until you're ready.
rights.bulletPoints.3: You can consent to all, some, or none of the proposed services - your child won't receive new services without your approval.
rights.bulletPoints.4: You have the right to request an IEP meeting at any time, not just at the annual review, and the school must schedule it within 30 days.
rights.bulletPoints.5: If an administrator isn't present at the meeting, you have the right to reschedule for a time when they can attend.
rights.bulletPoints.6: By law, your case manager must provide you with a booklet of your parental rights before the IEP meeting.
summary.noDocuments: No documents found. Please upload an IEP document first.
summary.processing.title: Document is being processed
summary.processing.message: This may take a few minutes. Meanwhile, please take a look at your rights as a parent:
summary.failed.title: Processing Failed
summary.failed.message: There was an error processing your document. Please try uploading it again.
summary.noTranslatedSummary.title: No Translated Summary Available
summary.noTranslatedSummary.message: No summary in your preferred language was found for this document.
summary.noContent: No content available for this section.
summary.noTranslatedSections.title: No Translated Sections Available
summary.noTranslatedSections.message: No sections in your preferred language were found for this document.
summary.noSummary.title: No Summary Available
summary.noSummary.message: No English summary was found for this document.
summary.noSections.title: No Sections Available
summary.noSections.message: No English sections were found for this document.
summary.noContentAvailable.title: No Content Available
summary.noContentAvailable.message: The document has been processed, but no summary or sections were found in any language.
summary.reuploadSuggestion: To get content in your preferred language, please re-upload your IEP document:
summary.noPreferredLanguageContent.title: Content Not Available in Your Preferred Language
summary.noPreferredLanguageContent.messa: This document was processed before your language preference was set. Re-upload your document to get it translated into your preferred language.
upload.title: Upload IEP Document
upload.error: Error uploading file. Please try again.

profile.title: Profile Information
revoke.title: Revoke Consent
revoke.description1: By revoking your consent, you will no longer be able to use the IEP Helper tool. Your data will be deleted from our system.
revoke.description2: Revoking consent will immediately sign you out of the application. You can restore your consent by logging back in and accepting the consent form.
revoke.error.failed: Failed to revoke consent. Please try again.
auth.title: Sign In
auth.signUpPrompt: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.signInPrompt: Already have an account? Sign In
auth.enterVerificationCode: Enter the code from your email
auth.verificationCodeSent: We've sent a verification code to this email address.
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include:
auth.errorUserNotConfirmed: Please confirm your account through the link sent to your email
auth.errorExpiredCode: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.errorUsernameExists: An account with this email already exists
auth.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.errorSignUp: An error occurred during sign up
auth.successPasswordReset: Password reset successful. Please sign in with your new password.
auth.successAccountCreated: Account created successfully! Please sign in with your credentials.
auth.successCodeResent: Verification code has been resent to your email
auth.smsConsent: By signing up using SMS, you consent to providing your phone number. We will use your phone number only for the purpose of sending you your login code.
auth.smsConsentMobile: By tapping "Send SMS Code", you expressly consent to receive one-time codes via SMS from The GovLab.
auth.smsFrequencyDisclaimer: Message frequency: one per login attempt. Reply HELP for help, STOP to unsubscribe. Message and data rates may apply.
auth.phoneNotFound: Phone number not found. Please register first or use email login.
auth.phoneNotRegistered: This phone number is not registered. Please contact support or use email login.
auth.smsCodeSent: SMS code sent. Please enter the verification code.
auth.smsCodeSentNewUser: Account created and SMS code sent! Please verify your phone number.
auth.smsCodeResent: SMS code has been resent to your phone!
auth.invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid US phone number (e.g., +1 (555) 555-5555)
auth.smsDeliveryFailed: Failed to send SMS. Please check your phone number and try again.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
auth.invalidSmsCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
auth.expiredSmsCode: Invalid verification code. Please request a new one.
auth.phoneAuthConfigIssue: Phone authentication configuration issue. Please contact support.
authNotAuthorized: Authentication not authorized. Please try again.
